items.sentence: I could've met you at the airport if you'd told me what time you were arriving.
Tom thought he'd broken a bone in his foot, but an X-ray showed that he hadn't.
She's popular, not because she's beautiful, but because she's kind to everyone.
Tom opened his mouth to say something, but Mary signaled for him to keep quiet.
I got it through my head that my parent's strict rules were for my own benefit.
